J. FORM ELEVEN
This form - printed on yellow paper - is a master sheet contain¬
ing all information given on Forms One through Seven. There is
additional space provided (Section Eight) in which the applicant
writes his own advertisement which is published in the NAEB
Newsletter Supplement.
One copy of this form is sent to each applicant. Three thou¬
sand copies of this form were printed.
K. FORM TWELVE
This form is identical with Form Eleven, with the exception that
it is printed on white paper. This form is to be retained by
the applicant for his personal file.
One copy of this form is sent to each applicant. Three thou¬
sand copies of this form were printed.
L. FORM THIRTEEN
This form contains the positions in television and radio desired
by the applicant. It also contains the location and salary
range desired by the applicant.
One copy of this form is sent to each applicant. Five thousand
copies of this form were printed.
M. FORM FOURTEEN
This form contains all particulars relative to a vacancy report
such as location, name and address of employer, type of position,
duties specified, qualifications desired, salary, and date and
method of notification. On the back of this card is space wherein
is written the names of the applicants recommend for the position*
These cards form the Vacancy File. Five hundred copies of this
form were printed.
N. FORM FIFTEEN
This form informs the recommended applicant of the particulars
of the position as found on Form Fourteen. On the reverse side
is space in which the applicant informs the Placement Officer
of his actions in regard to the position.
One copy of this form is sent to each applicant recommended for
a position. The form is divided into two sections: the top
section contains the location of the position and instructions
as to the procedure the applicant is to follow; on the reverse
side of this section the applicant indicates the course of action
he has chosen and returns this section to the Placement Officer.
The bottom section contains the information given on Form Fourteen.
